channel.title: Timer for reciving items [317] [rep++]

item.title: Timer for reciving items [317] [rep++]
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Sorry; I’m not familiar with Delta much, but you could try this;

public void alchs() {
    int alchGiven = System.currentTimeMillis();
    if (System.currentTimeMillis() - alchGiven < 8000)
        return;
    sM("Some alching supplies magically appear in your inventory.");
    addItem(67, 100);
    addItem(561, 100);
    addItem(1387, 1);
}

Doubt it will work, but it’s work a try;[/quote]
Didn’t work, but thanks for trying

Read full topic

item.title: Timer for reciving items [317] [rep++]
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Try this;

public void alchs() { if (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastButton < 8000) return; sM("Some alching supplies magically appear in your inventory."); addItem(67, 100); addItem(561, 100); addItem(1387, 1); } [/quote]
Nope, thanks for trying but you just get all the items, no limit to the time.

Read full topic

item.title: Timer for reciving items [317] [rep++]
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Hi, im working on a little update for my game so that players can get some alching stuff for free and be able to train a little and get some cash if they have nothing. So right now I have it all working find but im having a little trouble finding out how to add a timer. I never really delta with timers for a private server and I don’t understand how they work. If anyone can help me out I would love you and rep++ you

My sad attempt at making a timer laugh all you want

public void alchs() { sM("Some alching supplies magically appear in your inventory."); addItem(67, 100); addItem(561, 100); addItem(1387, 1); if (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastButton < 800) { return; } }

Thanks! -Andrew

Read full topic
